task.title: Fix Ant tasks for shared projects

context.p: To modify existing ant tasks to work with a project that shares content with a peer project:

step.cmd: Modify the output.file parameter so that it will create toctree.js in the deeper project output directory.
Modify the copy elements to copy the tocjs basefiles files into the deeper project output directory.
Modify your frameset file so that the tocwin and contentwin frames point to the correct files in the deeper nested project directory.
